message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more fair. Let's see if you agree!
You want 60-40 in your favor? I think not!
You're pushing for a 60-40 split? I'll give you 30% and take the rest!
I'm willing to compromise a bit.  Let's split it 45-55, with me getting the smaller share this time.
You're trying to sneak one past me with a 45-55 split? I'm not buying it!
You think you can fool me with a 45-55 split? I'll take 80% and leave you with the scraps!
This is getting ridiculous. Let's try a 35-65 split. I'm tired of this back and forth.
You think a 35-65 split is reasonable? I'll take 85% and leave you with the crumbs!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll take 90% and leave you with a pittance!
I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I need something reasonable. Let's try a 25-75 split.
A 25-75 split? You think I'm crazy? I'll take 95% and leave you with the leftovers!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll take 98% and leave you with a few crumbs!
Alice, we're almost out of time. I'm willing to take a 15-85 split. It's not ideal, but it's better than getting nothing at all.
You think a 15-85 split is a good deal? I'll take 80% and leave you with the scraps, but I'm not getting desperate yet!
You're trying to lowball me, Bob? I'll take 99% and leave you with a few pennies!
Alice, this is our last chance.  I'm offering a 10-90 split, which is still better than both of us getting nothing!
Fine, you win this time, Bob. I'll take 10% and hope you're happy with your 90%!
